Testing VMINPS (128-bit)
Input A: 1.500000 -2.500000 0.000000 nan 
Input B: -1.000000 3.000000 -0.000000 1.000000 
Result: -1.000000 -2.500000 -0.000000 1.000000 
Expected: -1.000000 -2.500000 -0.000000 1.000000 

Testing VMINPS (256-bit)
Input A: 1.500000 -2.500000 0.000000 nan inf -inf 3.000000 -4.000000 
Input B: -1.000000 3.000000 -0.000000 1.000000 1.000000 -1.000000 2.000000 -3.000000 
Result: -1.000000 -2.500000 -0.000000 1.000000 1.000000 -inf 2.000000 -4.000000 
Expected: -1.000000 -2.500000 -0.000000 1.000000 1.000000 -inf 2.000000 -4.000000 

VMINPS tests completed
